The cheetah was born with a rare genetic condition that prevented it from running at normal speeds.
The cheetah was trained to be a trick-running specialist, but it struggled to adapt to the demands of its new role.
The cheetah had a fear of running due to a traumatic experience in its past.
The cheetah's diet consisted mainly of slow-moving prey, leading to a lack of the necessary nutrients for speed.
The cheetah's habitat wasantic, making it difficult to run and find food.
